1.speaker: Karen
1.text: It is all over the news. The world is coming to an end!

2.speaker: Karen
2.text: You should go up to the television to find out more!

0.speaker: Karen
0.text: Are you just gonna leave us here?

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: You travelled through all through the night and consequently lost some health. You feel tired and already start missing home.

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: You travelled all through the night and consequently lost some health. You feel tired and already start missing home.

1.speaker: NightTime
1.text: Your companion(s) was hungry and went on a midnight eating binge. As a result your food supply was decreased.

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: You travelled all through the night and consequently lost some health. Home seems like a distant dream.

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: While you were sleeping Hank stole an item and fled the scene!

0.speaker: Hank
0.text: Your weird neighbor Hank wants to join you on your journey? Do you want to take him with you?

0.speaker: Newsarticle
0.text: Missing person report! Police are searching for a missing woman. She left her house and did not come back. Concerns are held as this behaviour is out of character.

0.speaker: Newsarticle
0.text: Missing person report! Frantic search for a missing teenager! Family asks for anyone with information about the whereabouts of a young girl  to contact authorities.

0.speaker: Basement
0.text: You went downstairs to the basement, when suddenly Hank attacks you! Luckily you have brought a weapon and are able to counter attack. Hank got scared and runs away!

0.speaker: Basement
0.text: You went to look for items in the basement, but everything went black before your eyes. Hank attacked you and you lose half your health.
